daily_fact: In the latest episode of "If You Can Make It Here," real estate mogul Ryan Serhant shares inspiring insights on resilience and innovation in New York City's dynamic market.
topline_md: New York City is bracing for a significant winter storm this weekend, with forecasts predicting over 15 inches of snow, while heightened security measures are in place following bomb threats at NYU and ongoing negotiations in a nurses' strike.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
